caption:
This photograph captures a dramatic and intense scene of a large fire. The focus of the image is on the massive, roaring flames consuming what appears to be a vast area. The fire is emitting a dense, swirling cloud of smoke that rises into the sky, glowing ominously from the bright, fierce blaze below.

In the foreground of the photo, we can see a large, white pipeline that arches across the frame. This pipeline perhaps suggests an industrial setting or an emergency response effort to combat the fire. The contrast between the dark, night-time environment and the bright, orange-yellow hues of the fire creates a stark visual impact.

The background is dominated by the dark silhouette of a landscape, possibly hills or a distant horizon, barely visible through the thick smoke and flames. The scene conveys a sense of urgency and devastation, highlighting the scale and power of the fire.
title: A texaco crude oil tank blazes against the night after being struck by lightning
